Package abyss.plugin.api

Class Stream

java.lang.Object
abyss.plugin.api.Stream
public class Stream extends Object
A simple byte stream implementation providing data encoding compatible with the RuneScape protocol.

A single position is used for both reading and writing.

TODO FIXME finish this, we don't really need it right now
